com.dabdm.travelplan
Class FtpHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.dabdm.travelplan.FtpHelper

public class FtpHelper
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a helper that provides functionalities to get and store a file on the TravelPlan server

connect

public boolean put(java.io.File file)

get

public boolean get(java.lang.String fileName,
                   java.io.OutputStream out)
This method get a file, which name is given in parameter, from the server. Then it stores it in the outputstream given in parameter.

Parameters:
fileName - : name of the file to get
out - : OutputStream in wich the file will be stored

close

public void close()
This method close the connection between the client and the server
